name: Duck Thugs
description:
DUCK THUGS

A game made for RNDGAME JAM II

STORY

You are MR HERO and you need to save the streets of NEO CITY from the evil DUCK THUGS 

HOW TO PLAY

Use the arrow buttons to move MR HERO

Press X to punch.

Punch DUCK THUGS to win

Avoid getting killed by DUCK THUGS

NOTES

I didn't have a lot of time to work on this so it didn't quite make it to a finished state, but I like it enough that I might come back to it in the future.

There are a number of features I wanted to implement including:

A title screen (the luxury...)

A game over screen (is this really a game?)

High scores

Waves of enemies

More varieties of enemies and weapons

Right now it is more of a prototype than a finished game but it's after midnight here and I'm working in the morning so this is as good as it's getting for now!

Please excuse the inevitable bugs :)
